title: As trade envoy, Prince Andrew promoted Britain and exploited his access
summary_full: For a decade, Andrew Mountbatten-Windsor, who was arrested on Thursday, advocated globally for U.K. trade, cooking up deals that at times made his family cringe.
summary_public: For a decade, Andrew Mountbatten-Windsor, who was arrested on Thursday, advocated globally for U.K. trade, cooking up deals that at times made his family cringe.

GB.label: neutral
GB.evidence: Prince Andrew promoted Britain and exploited his access
